data.text: @NHSEnglandLDN @NHSEnglandLDN shame on you all. Let's hope these kids have no ill effects in the long term.... Something you literally can't comment on, because no one knows it's long term effects. @NHS @NHSEnglandLDN once AGAIN SHAME ON YOU
@NHSEnglandLDN ‘There was no need to be scared’ there was no need for the lad to have it in the first place.
